name: Mobility

sections.text: Whenever you use Mobility, you gain a +6 dodge bonus to AC instead of the normal +4. In addition, once per round when an attack of opportunity provoked by your movement misses you, you may move 5 feet as a free action. This movement doesn't count against your total overall movement for the round, but it does provoke attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You have perfected your ability to weave through the battlefield, using your momentum to propel yourself far.
